items.summary: Restore Splash screen as initial landing screen with simple NEXUS logo (text-based, Playfair Display italic), hero background photo with dark overlay, tagline in Playfair Display italic, and two rounded-full buttons: 'EXPLORER' (sand #E8D5B0 background) and 'ESPACE PRO' (white outline), replacing current LandingPage component as default initial screen

Restore exact Version 8 color palette throughout entire application: background #0a0a0a (deep black), primary accent #E8D5B0 (sand), text white #FFFFFF, muted text #9CA3AF, replacing all gold #D4AF37 and copper #B87333 colors from Version 10

Ensure Explorer screen displays exactly 6 hardcoded providers (Julien Rossi - Coiffure domicile, Mageste Labs - Coiffure salon, Sophiane Hair - Barber domicile/salon, Lucie Esthetics - Esthétique domicile, Zen Touch - Massage domicile, Noura Beauty - Onglerie salon) with category filter pills (Tous/Coiffure/Barber/Esthétique/Massage/Onglerie), mode filter pills (Tous/Domicile/Salon), city selector, geolocation filter, and provider cards grid

Restore NEXUS OS screen with exactly 4 tabs: RADAR (incoming booking requests with ACCEPTER/REFUSER buttons), WALLET (balance display, escrow, transaction history), PORTFOLIO (studio management with 'Créer mon studio' button), AGENDA (weekly calendar with toggleable time slots)

Preserve complete booking flow with screens: BookingLocation (location choice with dynamic pricing), BookingDate (4-day calendar with time slots filtering past times and blocked slots), BookingContact (form with name, phone, conditional address, validation, success toast)

Maintain Builder 4-step form: Step 1 (artist name, category dropdown for Barber/Coiffure/Esthétique/Massage/Tatouage/Piercing/Branding/Illustration, multi-city selector, phone, bio, cover photo 1200x400, logo, gallery minimum 3 photos), Step 2 Logistics (JE ME DÉPLACE/AU STUDIO checkboxes, conditional studio address and GPS coordinates, radius simulator), Step 3 Services (service name, dual pricing, duration, multiple services, service photos with mandatory main photo), Step 4 Availability (weekly calendar with toggleable time slots)

Add fluid micro-interactions to all interactive elements: buttons display subtle glow effect on hover (using box-shadow with sand #E8D5B0 color), scale transform (1.0 to 1.02) on press, smooth 300ms transitions with cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) easing

Implement elegant page transition animations between all screens: fade-in with opacity 0 to 1 transition over 300ms, slight upward translation (translateY(20px) to 0), proper forward/backward direction handling based on navigation context

Add staggered reveal animations to list items and cards: elements fade in with 100ms delay increment between siblings as they appear, using opacity 0 to 1 transition with slight upward translation (translateY(20px) to 0)

Enhance all form inputs with refined styling: subtle focus glow effect with sand #E8D5B0 color, smooth border color transitions, placeholder text animations, proper error state styling with red accent and shake animation on validation failure

Add smooth card hover effects throughout application: subtle lift with box-shadow elevation increase, scale transform (1.0 to 1.02), border glow with sand #E8D5B0 color, 300ms transition duration for addictive interaction feel

Implement loading state animations with elegant spinners or skeleton screens: use sand #E8D5B0 accent color for loading indicators, smooth pulse animations for skeleton screens, display during data fetching or image uploads

Add subtle success feedback animations: checkmark icon scale-in animation with elastic easing when actions succeed, toast notifications slide in from top with bounce effect, use green accent for success states maintaining overall dark theme

Enhance navigation flow between screens to be completely friction-free: ensure back buttons work consistently, maintain scroll position where appropriate, preload next screen data to eliminate loading delays, add subtle navigation breadcrumbs for complex flows

Polish image displays with refined presentation: ensure all images use object-fit cover with proper aspect ratios, add subtle border radius to image containers, implement smooth fade-in on image load, display elegant placeholder during loading with sand #E8D5B0 shimmer effect

Refine typography hierarchy with improved readability: ensure proper font weight contrast between headings (Inter 900 uppercase for provider names) and body text (Playfair Display italic for descriptions), optimal line heights (1.6 for body, 1.2 for headings), proper letter spacing for uppercase text (0.12em)

Remove LandingPage component completely and all associated premium landing page features (pricing showcase, testimonials carousel, features list, hero section with parallax), ensuring Splash screen is the default initial screen without option to navigate to landing page

Update subscription screen to display original Version 8 pricing: 'GRATUIT le premier mois, puis 199 CHF/an' (not 39 CHF/mois), remove all references to monthly 39 CHF pricing and annual 390 CHF option throughout application

Ensure all Version 8 core functionalities are preserved and working: client authentication (phone + OTP), pro authentication (email/password with demo account pro@nexus.ch), geolocation filtering with distance calculation, provider filtering by category/mode/city, booking request management in RADAR tab, blocked time slots filtering in calendar, localStorage persistence for all data
